documentation.title: Plugin Menu Slug
documentation.standard: Wordpress functions that can be used to add pages to the WP Admin menu should not include `__FILE__` for the menu slug (or parent menu slug) parameter to avoid revealing system paths.

code_comparison.code: add_menu_page( 'My Plugin Main Page', 'My Plugin', 'manage_options', 'my-plugin-main', 'my_plugin_main_page' ); add_submenu_page( 'my_plugin_main_page', 'My Plugin Subpage', 'Subpage', 'manage_options', 'my-plugin-subpage', 'my_plugin_subpage' );

add_menu_page( 'My Plugin Main Page', 'My Plugin', 'manage_options', __FILE__, 'my_plugin_main_page' ); add_submenu_page( 'my_plugin_main_page', 'My Plugin Subpage', 'Subpage', 'manage_options', __FILE__, 'my_plugin_subpage' );
